name: Malthus
content:
Malthus

The Five-Beaked

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 326
Pathfinder Wiki Malthus

Details

Alignment LE
Pantheon Infernal Dukes
Areas of Concern Architecture, expansion, waste
Domains Artifice, Evil, Knowledge, Law
Subdomains Construct, Devil (Evil), Devil (Law), Memory, Toil
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Light crossbow
Symbol Five crossed arrows
Sacred Animal(s) Parrot
Sacred Color(s) Blue, red

Obedience

Shoot or throw 26 flaming projectiles into the sky. Gain a +4 profane bonus on Reflex saving throws to avoid physical dangers.

Boons - Infernal Dukes

Source Book of the Damned pg. 118
The Lords of Hell, the Dukes of Perdition, and the Princes of Damnation are all names for the infamous nobility of the Pit- the elite caste of devilkind known as the infernal dukes.

All infernal dukes are lawful evil and range in power from CR 26 to CR 27. The boons they grant are less complex than those granted by archdevils, manifesting as spell-like abilities usable once per day each.

1: flame arrow
2: rampart
3: wall of suppression

For Followers of Malthus

Feats

Hellish Shackles
